text:
Ampyx Power | Software Engineer | The Hague, The Netherlands | ONSITE

We are an international and multi-disciplinary team developing an Airborne Wind Energy System (AWES) that can access powerful wind at high altitude using tethered unmanned aircraft. Check our website for technical details: https://www.ampyxpower.com/

Positions:

* Visualisation/UI Software Engineer: C++, Qt5, POSIX.

* Embedded Software Engineer: C, baremetal ARM Cortex-M.

Apply online:

* https://ampyxpowerjobs.recruitee.com/

* https://ampyxpowerjobs.recruitee.com/o/software-engineer

* https://ampyxpowerjobs.recruitee.com/o/open-application
